sn47.30:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena mānadinno gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn47.30:4.3: Atha kho mānadinno gahapati aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
sn47.30:4.5: na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
sn47.30:4.6: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
sn47.30:4.8: Evarūpāya cāhaṃ, bhante, dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ;
sn47.30:4.11: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn47.30:4.12: Yāni cimāni, bhante, bhagavatā pañcorambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni desitāni, nāhaṃ, bhante, tesaṃ kiñci attani appahīnaṃ samanupassāmī”ti.
